Description and Examples: Admissions originating from home/community that are triaged through ED. Examples: Home, ED (Emergency Department), Law Enforcement, Community, Work
Admissions coming from various healthcare facilities providing ongoing or transitional care. Examples: Rehab, SNF (Skilled Nursing Facility), LTACH
Admissions transferred from outside hospitals. Examples: Other Hospitals
Direct admissions from outpatient care environments. Examples: Clinics, Physician Offices, Ambulatory Surgery Centers
Planned or prescheduled admissions, often for non-emergency procedures. Examples: Prescheduled Surgeries, Planned Admissions (such as induced baby delivery)
Admissions from undefined or less typical sources. Examples: Unknown Sources
